titles.title: Expressing appreciation for the life and service of Ambassador Pamela C. Harriman.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Mr. Gilman asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

RESERVATION OF OBJECTION - Mr. Hamilton reserved the right to object in order to permit an explanation of the pending resolution. Subsequent to the explanation, Mr. Hamilton will remove his reservation and the House will proceed to consideration of the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/11/1997--Introduced. Expresses gratitude for the life and service of the late Pamela C. Harriman, U.S. Ambassador to France. Extends condolences to her family.
